I created a test to see what numbers failed the pow test over 2**50 and the list came up with these recurring numbers
so i added them to the fast_probabilist_test. Still i don't know how error free it is. This is just an education 
exercise i ran and found the results interesting that i couldn't find any other numbers other than the pow list over 2**50
that didn't fail:

So the fermat pow list for fast_probabilist_test is [2,3,5,17,257,641,65537]
